result.reason: Current default external tools only include shells (cmd, pwsh, wsl); adding common networking tools like Ping and Traceroute would significantly improve the out-of-the-box experience for new users.
result.approach: Refactor `AddBuiltInShellPresetIfMissing` in `ExternalAppsLoader.cs` to support arguments and integration settings, then use it to add Ping (`ping -t %HOST%`) and Traceroute (`tracert %HOST%`) to the default tool list if they are missing.
